Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute at Pershing/Washtenaw
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via Pershing, California, 35th, Western, Archer and Pershing: due to street blockage near Pershing/Washtenaw.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via Pershing, California, 35th, Western, Archer, Pershing and over regular route: due to street blockage near Pershing/Washtenaw.

Allow extra travel time.
